017package org.microbean.interceptor;
018
019import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
020import java.lang.constant.MethodTypeDesc;
021
022import java.util.Collection;
023import java.util.Iterator;
024import java.util.List;
025import java.util.Objects;
026import java.util.TreeSet;
027
028import java.util.function.Function;
029
030import org.microbean.qualifier.Bindings;
031
032import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Collection;
033
034import static java.lang.constant.DirectMethodHandleDesc.Kind.STATIC;
035
036import static org.microbean.interceptor.ConstantDescs.CD_InterceptorBindings;
037import static org.microbean.interceptor.ConstantDescs.CD_Iterable;
038
039/**
040 * An immutable {@link Bindings} containing {@link InterceptorBinding}
041 * instances.
042 *
043 * <p>This is a <a
044 * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/doc-files/ValueBased.html">value-based</a>
045 * class.</p>
046 *
047 * @param <K> the type of a {@link InterceptorBinding}'s {@linkplain
048 * InterceptorBinding#attributes() attribute keys}
049 *
050 * @param <V> the type of a {@link InterceptorBinding}'s {@linkplain
051 * InterceptorBinding#attributes() attribute values}
052 *
053 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
054 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
055 *
056 * @see Bindings
057 */
058public final class InterceptorBindings<K extends Comparable<? super K>, V> extends Bindings<K, V, InterceptorBinding<K, V>> {
059
060
061  /*
062   * Static fields.
063   */
064
065
066  private static final InterceptorBindings<?, ?> EMPTY = new InterceptorBindings<>(List.of());
067
068
069  /*
070   * Constructors.
071   */
072
073
074  private InterceptorBindings(final Iterable<? extends InterceptorBinding<K, V>> interceptorBindings) {
075    super(interceptorBindings);
076  }
077
078
079  /*
080   * Instance methods.
081   */
082
083
084  /**
085   * Returns a <strong>usually new</strong> {@link
086   * InterceptorBindings} with this {@link InterceptorBindings}'
087   * entries and an additional entry consisting of the supplied {@link
088   * InterceptorBinding}.
089   *
090   * <p>The returned {@link InterceptorBindings} <strong>will be
091   * new</strong> unless {@code interceptorBinding} is {@code null},
092   * in which case {@code this} will be returned.</p>
093   *
094   * @param interceptorBinding a {@link InterceptorBinding}; may be
095   * {@code null} in which case {@code this} will be returned
096   *
097   * @return a {@link InterceptorBindings} with this {@link
098   * InterceptorBindings}' entries and an additional entry consisting
099   * of the supplied {@link InterceptorBinding}
100   *
101   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
102   *
103   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
104   *
105   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
106   * threads.
107   *
108   * @see #plus(Iterable)
109   */
110  public final InterceptorBindings<K, V> plus(final InterceptorBinding<K, V> interceptorBinding) {
111    if (interceptorBinding == null) {
112      return this;
113    } else if (this.isEmpty()) {
114      return of(interceptorBinding);
115    } else {
116      return this.plus(List.of(interceptorBinding));
117    }
118  }
119
120  /**
121   * Returns a <strong>usually new</strong> {@link
122   * InterceptorBindings} with this {@link InterceptorBindings}'
123   * entries and additional entries represented by the supplied {@code
124   * interceptorBindings}.
125   *
126   * <p>The returned {@link InterceptorBindings} <strong>will be
127   * new</strong> unless {@code interceptorBinding} is {@code null},
128   * in which case {@code this} will be returned.</p>
129   *
130   * @param interceptorBindings additional {@link
131   * InterceptorBinding}s; may be {@code null} in which case {@code
132   * this} will be returned
133   *
134   * @return a {@link InterceptorBindings} with this {@link
135   * InterceptorBindings}' entries and additional entries represented
136   * by the supplied {@code interceptorBindings}
137   *
138   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
139   *
140   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
141   *
142   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
143   * threads.
144   */
145  public final InterceptorBindings<K, V> plus(final Iterable<? extends InterceptorBinding<K, V>> interceptorBindings) {
146    if (interceptorBindings == null) {
147      return this;
148    } else if (this.isEmpty()) {
149      return of(interceptorBindings);
150    }
151    final Collection<InterceptorBinding<K, V>> newInterceptorBindings = new TreeSet<>();
152    for (final InterceptorBinding<K, V> q : this) {
153      newInterceptorBindings.add(q);
154    }
155    for (final InterceptorBinding<K, V> q : interceptorBindings) {
156      newInterceptorBindings.add(q);
157    }
158    return of(newInterceptorBindings);
159  }
160
161  /**
162   * Returns a <strong>usually new</strong> {@link
163   * InterceptorBindings} whose {@link InterceptorBinding}s'
164   * {@linkplain InterceptorBinding#attributes() attribute keys} are
165   * prefixed with the supplied {@code prefix}.
166   *
167   * <p>If this {@link InterceptorBindings} is {@linkplain #isEmpty()
168   * empty}, then {@code this} is returned.</p>
169   *
170   * @param prefix a prefix; if {@code null} then {@code this} will be
171   * returned
172   *
173   * @return a <strong>usually new</strong> {@link
174   * InterceptorBindings} whose {@link InterceptorBinding}s'
175   * {@linkplain InterceptorBinding#attributes() attribute keys} are
176   * prefixed with the supplied {@code prefix}
177   *
178   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
179   *
180   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic,
181   * assuming the supplied {@link Function} is.
182   *
183   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
184   * threads
185   */
186  public final InterceptorBindings<K, V> withPrefix(final String prefix) {
187    if (prefix == null || this.isEmpty()) {
188      return this;
189    }
190    return this.withPrefix(q -> prefix + q.name());
191  }
192
193  /**
194   * Returns a <strong>usually new</strong> {@link
195   * InterceptorBindings} whose {@link InterceptorBinding}s'
196   * {@linkplain InterceptorBinding#attributes() attribute keys} are
197   * produced by the supplied {@link Function}, which is expected to
198   * prepend a prefix to the original key and return the result.
199   *
200   * <p>If this {@link InterceptorBindings} is {@linkplain #isEmpty()
201   * empty}, then {@code this} is returned.</p>
202   *
203   * @param f a deterministic, idempotent {@link Function} that
204   * accepts keys drawn from this {@link InterceptorBindings}' {@link
205   * InterceptorBinding}s' {@linkplain InterceptorBinding#attributes()
206   * attribute keys} and returns a non-{@code null} prefixed version
207   * of that key; may be {@code null} in which case {@code this} will
208   * be returned
209   *
210   * @return a <strong>usually new</strong> {@link
211   * InterceptorBindings} whose {@link InterceptorBinding}s'
212   * {@linkplain InterceptorBinding#attributes() attribute keys} have
213   * been prefixed by the actions of the supplied {@link Function}
214   *
215   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
216   *
217   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic,
218   * assuming the supplied {@link Function} is.
219   *
220   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
221   * threads, assuming the supplied {@link Function} is
222   */
223  public final InterceptorBindings<K, V> withPrefix(final Function<? super InterceptorBinding<K, V>, ? extends String> f) {
224    if (f == null || this.isEmpty()) {
225      return this;
226    }
227    final Collection<InterceptorBinding<K, V>> newInterceptorBindings = new TreeSet<>();
228    for (final InterceptorBinding<K, V> q : this) {
229      newInterceptorBindings.add(InterceptorBinding.of(f.apply(q),
230                                     q.value(),
231                                     q.attributes(),
232                                     q.info()));
233    }
234    return of(newInterceptorBindings);
235  }
236
237  /**
238   * Returns a {@link MethodHandleDesc} describing the constructor or
239   * {@code static} method that will be used to create a <a
240   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">dynamic
241   * constant</a> representing this {@link InterceptorBindings}.
242   *
243   * @return a {@link MethodHandleDesc} describing the constructor or
244   * {@code static} method that will be used to create a <a
245   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">dynamic
246   * constant</a> representing this {@link InterceptorBindings}
247   *
248   * @nullability This method does not, and its overrides must not,
249   * return {@code null}.
250   *
251   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
252   * idempotent and deterministic.
253   *
254   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
255   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
256   */
257  @Override // Bindings<K, V, InterceptorBinding<K, V>>
258  protected final MethodHandleDesc describeConstructor() {
259    return
260      MethodHandleDesc.ofMethod(STATIC,
261                                CD_InterceptorBindings,
262                                "of",
263                                MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_InterceptorBindings, CD_Iterable));
264  }
265
266
267  /*
268   * Static methods.
269   */
270
271
272  /**
273   * Returns a {@link InterceptorBindings}, which may or may not be
274   * newly created, whose {@link #isEmpty() isEmpty()} method will
275   * return {@code true}.
276   *
277   * @param <K> the type of the {@link InterceptorBinding}'s
278   * {@linkplain InterceptorBinding#attributes() attribute keys}
279   *
280   * @param <V> the type of the {@link InterceptorBinding}'s
281   * {@linkplain InterceptorBinding#attributes() attribute values}
282   *
283   * @return a {@link InterceptorBindings}
284   *
285   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
286   *
287   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
288   *
289   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
290   * threads.
291   */
292  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
293  public static final <K extends Comparable<? super K>, V> InterceptorBindings<K, V> of() {
294    return (InterceptorBindings<K, V>)EMPTY;
295  }
296
297  /**
298   * Returns a {@link InterceptorBindings}, which may or may not be
299   * newly created, representing the supplied arguments.
300   *
301   * @param <K> the type of the {@link InterceptorBinding}'s
302   * {@linkplain InterceptorBinding#attributes() attribute keys}
303   *
304   * @param <V> the type of the {@link InterceptorBinding}'s
305   * {@linkplain InterceptorBinding#attributes() attribute values}
306   *
307   * @param interceptorBinding the sole {@link InterceptorBinding} the
308   * {@link InterceptorBindings} will contain; must not be {@code
309   * null}
310   *
311   * @return a {@link InterceptorBindings}
312   *
313   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code interceptorBinding} is {@code
314   * null}
315   *
316   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
317   *
318   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
319   *
320   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
321   * threads.
322   */
323  public static final <K extends Comparable<? super K>, V> InterceptorBindings<K, V> of(final InterceptorBinding<K, V> interceptorBinding) {
324    return of(List.of(Objects.requireNonNull(interceptorBinding, "interceptorBinding")));
325  }
326
327  /**
328   * Returns a {@link InterceptorBindings}, which may or may not be
329   * newly created, representing the supplied arguments.
330   *
331   * @param <K> the type of the {@link InterceptorBinding}'s
332   * {@linkplain InterceptorBinding#attributes() attribute keys}
333   *
334   * @param <V> the type of the {@link InterceptorBinding}'s
335   * {@linkplain InterceptorBinding#attributes() attribute values}
336   *
337   * @param interceptorBindings an {@link Iterable} representing
338   * {@link InterceptorBinding} instances the {@link
339   * InterceptorBindings} will contain; may be {@code null}
340   *
341   * @return a {@link InterceptorBindings}
342   *
343   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
344   *
345   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
346   *
347   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
348   * threads.
349   */
350  // This method is used by the describeConstructor() method.
351  public static final <K extends Comparable<? super K>, V> InterceptorBindings<K, V> of(final Iterable<? extends InterceptorBinding<K, V>> interceptorBindings) {
352    if (interceptorBindings == null) {
353      return of();
354    }
355    final Iterator<? extends InterceptorBinding<K, V>> i = interceptorBindings.iterator();
356    if (i.hasNext()) {
357      final Collection<InterceptorBinding<K, V>> newInterceptorBindings = new TreeSet<>();
358      newInterceptorBindings.add(i.next());
359      while (i.hasNext()) {
360        newInterceptorBindings.add(i.next());
361      }
362      return new InterceptorBindings<>(newInterceptorBindings);
363    }
364    return of();
365  }
366
367}
